name: Charon's Passage
description:
Code By:

Omar "Kegnor" El Fakih

Daniel "Gappy" Rivero

Jose Moncada

Art By:

Jose Moncada

Stupid Zack

Music by:

Miguel Quintero

Summary

protect an innocent soul from the spirits of the Styx river, as you take it to the underworld

This was originally meant to be submitted to the  Extra Credits Gamejam  #5, but failed to meet the deadline

Controls:

html build-> click where you want to shoot

android build-> slide your finger in the direction you want to shoot
